Queries.AddTariffAmtInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.tariffamt (InExpense, Expense_Amount, Expense_To, ThroughBy_Expense, Expense_Date, Remarks_Expense, EDT_V, EDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date, E_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@InExpense, @Expense_Amount, @Expense_To, @ThroughBy_Expense, @Expense_Date, @Remarks_Expense, @EDT_V, @EDT_V_Date, @DDT_V_Date, @E_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateTariffAmtData: UPDATE ct_db.tariffamt SET InExpense = @InExpense, Expense_Amount = @Expense_Amount, Expense_To = @Expense_To, ThroughBy_Expense = @ThroughBy_Expense, Expense_Date = @Expense_Date, Remarks_Expense = @Remarks_Expense, EDT_V = @EDT_V, EDT_V_Date = @EDT_V_Date, DDT_V_Date = @DDT_V_Date, E_Insrt_Person = @E_Insrt_Person, E_Updt_Person = @E_Updt_Person, E_Del_Person = @E_Del_Person WHERE InExpense = @InExpense;
